coreAttributes.name: sport shorts
coreAttributes.description: A pair of sporty unisex shorts, of the sort typically worn by people partaking in athletic sports or other forms of exercise.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the sport shorts, before pulling them up to fit around [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the sport shorts, before pulling them up to fit around [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step into the sport shorts, before yanking them up to fit around [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc.her] sport shorts, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] sport shorts, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] sport shorts, before yanking them off.
